summary: BMONEY - B Money is an alternate persona of Brett, one of the central characters in Matt Furie’s "Boys Club" series. Brett, known for his laid-back and fun-loving personality, transforms into B Money, a character embodying a more edgy and adventurous lifestyle. In this alter ego, B Money represents a hustler's spirit, navigating the worlds of crypto, luxury, and high-stakes adventures with the same charm that characterizes Furie's work.
